title: 服务器崩溃
author: 放弃爱你
txt_content:
本帖最后由 放弃爱你 于 2020-7-16 09:25 编辑 

vingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 2: ASM: tconstruct.armor.TinkerArmorEvents@7d66a6b perfectDodge(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 3: ASM: vazkii.botania.common.item.relic.ItemOdinRing@7178e175 onPlayerAttacked(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 4: ASM: thaumic.tinkerer.common.item.ItemBloodSword@29c453e1 onDamageTaken(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 5: ASM: com.kentington.thaumichorizons.common.lib.EventHandlerEntity@a2b1450 onAttack(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 6: ASM: mekanism.common.item.ItemGasMask@136e112b onEntityAttacked(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V

[21:19:38 ERROR]: 8: ASM: mods.flammpfeil.slashblade.ability.UntouchableTime@368b6ed5 onLivingAttackEvent(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 9: ASM: fox.spiteful.avaritia.LudicrousEvents@6c3058a6 onAttacked(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 10: ASM: twilightforest.TFEventListener@24b3636d livingAttack(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 11: ASM: thaumic.tinkerer.common.potion.PotionEffectHandler@6a9b7d33 onLivingHurt(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 12: ASM: mods.flammpfeil.slashblade.stats.AchievementList@3b6017ad livingAttackEvent(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 13: LOW
[21:19:38 ERROR]: 14: ASM: com.brandon3055.draconicevolution.common.handler.MinecraftForgeEventHandler@25a23447 onLivingAttack(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingAttackEvent;)V




这是后台一直在刷的信息 然后服务器卡住不动  过了一会就崩溃了 能不能看看什么原因




已自行解决：原因是玩家在生存建的刷怪塔导致单一区块内部僵尸过多，导致服务器卡顿
